sentences.en: Even the most minor forms of misbehaviour were punished.
sentences.cn: 再小的违规行为也都受到了惩罚。

sentences.en: He jumped on me for that misbehaviour.
sentences.cn: 他对我的不端行为严加责备.

sentences.en: He jumped on us for that misbehaviour.
sentences.cn: 他对我们那个错误行为严加指责.

sentences.en: He verbally laced into his son for his misbehaviour.
sentences.cn: 他严厉斥责儿子的行为不端.

sentences.en: I've heard reports about his misbehaviour.
sentences.cn: 我曾听到过关于他行为不端的传闻.

sentences.en: If the toddler had been dealt with properly at first, the rest of his misbehaviour would have been avoided.
sentences.cn: 要是从一开始就对小孩子合理管教，他就不会养成其他的坏毛病。

sentences.en: Pointing with chopsticks when chatting over dinner is also a misbehaviour.
sentences.cn: 餐间交谈时用筷子指指点点也是一种不礼貌的行为.

sentences.en: She closed her eyes to her children's misbehaviour.
sentences.cn: 她对自己孩子的不端行为视而不见.

sentences.en: The misbehaviour of a few makes the whole group appear in a had light.
sentences.cn: 一些人的不正当举动会对整个小组不利.

sentences.en: This misbehaviour will certainly go against his chances of promotion.
sentences.cn: 违反军规肯定会不利于他的升迁.

sentences.en: Understands that CIC may suspend or cancel their enrolment for misbehaviour.
sentences.cn: 了解cic有权因申请学生的不当行为而延缓或取消器申请.

trans.tran_cn: 不礼貌，品行不端，违反军规
trans.tran_en: bad behaviour that is not acceptable to other people
